extension.author: Denis
extension.label: vSphere Data Collector
extension.description: Inventory Data Collector for VMWare Sphere
extension.version_description:
**Bug fixes:**
* The os_version_mapping was used only for Hypervisors, made it work for VirtualMachines also. * Proper support of UTF-8 characters in regular expressions (the code now always uses the 'u' modifier)
